name: Delicious Berries and Fried Meat
desc: Fried meat accompanied by mashed potatoes. The marbled meat is savory and flavorful. When paired with the natural sweetness of the berries, it feels like your tongue is wandering through the wilderness — full of delight and healing for the soul.

customize.name: Recipe: Berries and Fried Meat
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Berries and Fried Meat.

customize.name: Berries and Fried Meat
customize.desc: Fried meat accompanied by mashed potatoes. The meat is thinly sliced, fried, then stewed, before being laid atop a bed of mashed potatoes. Usually eaten with crushed berries. Nutritious and filling!

customize.name: Suspicious Berries and Fried Meat
customize.desc: Fried meat accompanied by mashed potatoes. The meat looks cooked but carries a strong taste of blood. If one can get past the idea of eating it raw, the flavor itself isn't actually all that bad...

customize.name: Delicious Berries and Fried Meat
customize.desc: Fried meat accompanied by mashed potatoes. The marbled meat is savory and flavorful. When paired with the natural sweetness of the berries, it feels like your tongue is wandering through the wilderness — full of delight and healing for the soul.

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Potato
customize.desc: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

customize.name: Midsommar Berry
customize.desc:
A fruit that grows in the warmer parts of Nod-Krai. It is beloved by animals emerging from winter and hungry children alike.
In the legacy of the Frostmoon Scions, Midsommar Berries are regarded as a symbol of life and abundance, for they only flourish during the warmth of spring and summer.
There is a tale that tells of the endless struggle between the King of Winter Holly and the King of Summer Oak — twin monarchs that slay each other as the seasons change, returning from the underworld to rule in turn until the end of time. Most Snezhnayan scholars dismiss this as a primitive religious metaphor for the alternating seasons — or at least that's what they tell themselves.

customize.name: Lakkaberry
customize.desc:
A fruit as white as pearl that tastes refreshingly sweet.
In the legends of the Frostmoon Scions, these fruits, like kuuhenki, are a gift from the Moon Maiden, a sacred symbol blessed by the new moon. Therefore, sharing and eating delicious Lakkaberries is also a form of worshipping Kuutar.
Even when not associated with the divine, their plumpness and sweetness alone are enough to awaken one's appetite.

value.text: Revives a character and restores 550 HP.
